definition: to depend on/to hang on in a place/bad/to renege (on promise)/to disclaim/to rat (on debts)/rascally/to blame/to put the blame on
to bind/bunch/bundle/classifier for bunches, bundles, beams of light etc/to control
to bear/to carry (on one's back)/to turn one's back on/to be defeated/negative (math. etc)
to depend on/to be dependent on
Rice (name)/Condoleezza Rice (1954-) US Secretary of State 2005-2009
to trust/to have confidence in/to have faith in/to rely on
Lai Changxing (1958-), notorious Xiamen mafia boss involved in large scale corruption and smuggling, extradited from Canada back to China in 2008
the Dalai Lama/abbr. of 達賴喇嘛|达赖喇嘛[Da2 lai4 La3 ma5]
to refuse to admit (what one has done)/to disavow/to renege
bored to death (idiom)/bored stiff/overcome with boredom
to act shamelessly/to refuse to acknowledge that one has lost the game, or made a promise etc/to act dumb/to act as if sth never happened

sentences.chinese: 許願就是債，欠了不容賴。
許願就是債，欠了不容賴。

sentences.english: She prefers to brazen it out rather than admit defeat.
sentences.chinese: 她寧可厚着臉皮賴下去，也不願承認失敗。

sentences.english: Filled with the fruit of justice, through Jesus Christ, unto the glory and praise of God.
sentences.chinese: 賴耶穌基督滿結義德的果實，爲光榮讚美天主。

sentences.english: Seeing off Carrefour or Tesco is just one of Lai's goals.
sentences.chinese: 爲家樂福或者樂購送行只是賴先生的目標之一。

sentences.english: Phoebe convinces him to keep living.
sentences.chinese: 菲比勸他好死不如賴活着。

sentences.english: Kinglony 's success depends on talent excellence, dedicated staff.
sentences.chinese: 金隆的成功，有賴才幹卓越，盡心盡力的員工。

sentences.english: Grace for the trials, help from above, Unfailing sympathy, undying love.
sentences.chinese: 試煉得恩助，危難有賴，無限的體諒，不死的愛。

sentences.english: Do not see the moon for thousands of years, only see the moon Lai Chizhou.
sentences.chinese: 不見明月千年越，唯見秋月賴池州。

sentences.english: The community's continued support is needed for further improvement of beach water quality in Hong Kong.
sentences.chinese: 泳灘水質的持續改善，有賴市民不斷的支持。

sentences.english: I love Lai, but I hate him to smoke.
sentences.chinese: 我愛小賴，但是討厭他抽菸。

sentences.english: Rydal has committed itself to respecting the will of the peoples of its various territories.
sentences.chinese: 賴德爾致力於尊重它不同地區上人民的意願。

sentences.english: Lai has also advised people to stay away from eating boiled eggs.
sentences.chinese: 賴博士同時也建議民衆不要喫溫泉蛋。

sentences.english: Rydal maintained exclusive authority over the defence and foreign relations of the Islands.
sentences.chinese: 賴德爾保留島嶼防禦工事和外交關係的唯一授權。

sentences.english: He produced Documentary Better to live on in 2004.
sentences.chinese: 2004年製作紀錄片《好死不如賴活着》。

definition: still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
to persevere with/to persist in/to insist on
to toil/labor/laborer/to put sb to trouble (of doing sth)/meritorious deed/to console (Taiwan pr. [lao4] for this sense)
to look after/to take into consideration/to attend to
to yield/to permit/to let sb do sth/to have sb do sth/to make sb (feel sad etc)/by (indicates the agent in a passive clause, like 被[bei4])
